name: I Spy Fantasy
description: Ages 6-10: Explore a world where the imagination can run wild, where your child can expand his or her creativity and pick up on some basic learning skills. There are three fantastic worlds full of unique activities, including searching for lost treasures beneath the sea, commanding a mission on an alien planet, defeating a dragon and rescuing a damsel in distress.Your child will have a fun learning experience as they encounter challenges through nine adventures and figure out the 54 challenging I Spy riddles. They will go on scavenger hunts in more than 30 intriguing locations. Handy tools, such as telescopes, microscopes and more help kids figure things out. The scenes will be personalized to contain your child's name and get them completely immersed in the learning experience. Features Nine exciting adventures More than 54 I SPY riddles to solve Scavenger hunts and games More than 30 thrilling locations A variety of tools, such as the telescope, microscope and much more Scenes are personalized and feature your child's name
